name: 交通機関運行状況
summary:
『交通機関運行状況』は、関東エリアの電車運行情報をタイムリーに知ることができるアプリ。また、プルダウンメニューから路線会社ごとの運行情報を調べることも可能だ。
--
You can get the Train operation information at one view.
"Transportation operating conditions" is a timely application can know the Kanto area train travel information.
Check for travel before boarding!
Features
■ travel information
Pages display the operation information provided by the railway companies.
Whether the delay of the item icons to the left.
"Yes " is displayed if there is a delay of more than 30 minutes.
"None" is displayed when there is no delay information.
In the right items to display travel time information is updated.
■ Search by route
You can find information about the company runs every route from the pulldown menu.
The can also find out from your search history.
If you like to use a fixed route, you can find it from the history and smoothly.
